name: icam_agent
label: IBM Cloud App Management Agent
description: Data structure describing the IBM Cloud App Management agent to be deployed on a host

attributes.name: icam_config_location
attributes.description: Source for the IBM Cloud App Management Agent configuration bundle, eg http://IP_ADDRESS:8888/ibm-cloud-app-datacenter-agents-configpack.tar
attributes.label: Configuration bundle source location

attributes.name: icam_agent_location
attributes.description: Source for the IBM Cloud App Management Agent installer, eg http://IP_ADDRESS:8888/APP_MGMT_Agent_Install_2018.4.1.tar.gz
attributes.label: Agent source location

attributes.name: icam_source_credentials
attributes.description: Credentials required to retrieve the IBM Cloud App Management agent and optional configuration bundle, provided in a user:password format
attributes.label: Source location credentials

attributes.name: icam_agent_installation_dir
attributes.description: IBM Cloud App Management installation directory
attributes.label: Agent installation directory

attributes.name: icam_agent_name
attributes.description: IBM Cloud App Management agent to be installed. For example, os.
attributes.label: Agent name
